tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE LuxuryTravelCompany (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination VARCHAR(255),
    experience VARCHAR(255),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    rating INT,
    forecasted_demand INT
)

CREATE TABLE Experiences (
   experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   experience_name TEXT NOT NULL,
   location_id INT,
   price DECIMAL,
   rating FLOAT,
   FOREIGN KEY (location_id) REFERENCES Locations(location_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Reservations (
   reservation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   experience_id INT,
   reservation_date DATE,
   customer_name TEXT NOT NULL,
   customer_email TEXT NOT NULL,
   FOREIGN KEY (experience_id) REFERENCES Experiences(experience_id)
);

CREATE TABLE luxury_travel_experiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experience_name VARCHAR(255),
    destination_id INT,
    experience_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    rating INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_destination_id FOREIGN KEY (destination_id) REFERENCES luxury_travel_destinations(destination_id)
);

CREATE TABLE business_strategies (
    strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_name VARCHAR(255),
    trend_id INT,
    forecast_year INT,
    CONSTRAINT fk_trend_id FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES travel_trends(trend_id)
);

CREATE TABLE luxury_travel_destinations (
    destination_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_name VARCHAR(50),
    region VARCHAR(50),
    avg_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE travel_experiences (
    experience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experience_name VARCHAR(50),
    destination_id INT,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    duration_hrs INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (destination_id) REFERENCES luxury_travel_destinations(destination_id)
)

CREATE TABLE customer_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    experience_id INT,
    rating INT,
    review TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (experience_id) REFERENCES travel_experiences(experience_id)
)

CREATE TABLE booking_history (
    booking_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    experience_id INT,
    booking_date DATE,
    total_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (experience_id) REFERENCES travel_experiences(experience_id)
)

CREATE TABLE sales_forecast (
    forecast_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    destination_id INT,
    forecast_date DATE,
    predicted_revenue DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (destination_id) REFERENCES luxury_travel_destinations(destination_id)
)
